name: replicache-prisma-nextjs
productName: Replicache Demo using Prisma and NextJS
description: Replicache is a JavaScript framework for building high-performance, offline-capable, collaborative web apps.
author: Martin Adams <heymartinadams@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.next: pscale connect lifeproductivityapp dev --execute-protocol 'mysql' --execute-env-url 'APP_DB' --execute 'doppler run -- next'
scripts.push: pscale connect lifeproductivityapp dev --execute-protocol 'mysql' --execute-env-url 'APP_DB' --execute 'doppler run -- prisma db push --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma --force-reset'
scripts.studio: pscale connect lifeproductivityapp dev --execute-protocol 'mysql' --execute-env-url 'APP_DB' --execute 'doppler run -- prisma studio --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma'
